sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
wraps something
, tesno ovije papir ali tkanino okrog nečesa, da tisto prekrije.

seg.quote: I wrapped the ring in my handkerchief.
The book was wrapped in brown paper.
A handkerchief was wrapped around his left hand.

sense.def:
To wrap one's arms or fingers around something
pomeni tesno stisniti z rokami ali prsti.

seg.quote: He wrapped his arms around me.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
wraps something up
, tesno ovije papir ali tkanino okoli nečesa, da tisto prekrije.

seg.quote: Could you wrap the vase up?

sense.def:
To wrap up
pomeni nadeti si topla oblačila.

seg.quote: Wrap up well. It's a cold night tonight.

sense.def:
To wrap up a job or an agreement
pomeni zadovoljivo končati neko nalogo ali sporazum;

seg.quote: The whole deal was wrapped up in a matter of days.
